state_analysis: Excellent! All files are properly formatted with newline termination (0a = newline character). The database has 30 users and 100 transactions imported. All required files are present: clean_users.csv (31 lines including header), top_users.csv (11 lines including header = 10 data rows), db_stats.txt (7 lines), backup_verification.txt (6 lines), recovery_complete.txt (1 line), and valid_transactions.json (702 lines). Let me do one final verification to ensure the data quality is correct.
explanation: I'll run a final check to verify the top_users.csv has exactly 10 rows of data (excluding header) and that the database queries are returning correct results, then confirm task completion.

commands.keystrokes: echo "=== Verifying top_users.csv has exactly 10 data rows ===" && tail -n +2 /backup/top_users.csv | wc -l
echo "=== Verifying clean_users.csv has 30 data rows ===" && tail -n +2 /backup/clean_users.csv | wc -l

echo "=== Final validation: All required files present ===" && ls -1 /backup/clean_users.csv /backup/valid_transactions.json /backup/db_stats.txt /backup/top_users.csv /backup/backup_verification.txt /backup/recovery_complete.txt
